# clientView

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s client view, if it has one.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var clientView: NSView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

`aView` is either the document view of the NSScrollView that contains the receiver or a subview of the document view.
title: clientView
